page.title: 15Industry in Bocking Today
page.content: {Bocking}has several small businesses. The oldest of these is that of{P.A.Poulton & Son,}where the 2nd and 3rd generation of the family work as farrier and blacksmith. There is{Robt. Christy Eng. Ltd}&{Pace {Packer,}making packing machinery for heavy paper bags for animal feed, etc. There are four businesses occupying what used to be the newer buildings of the{Courtauld Factory. {Bakehouse Ltd}- bakers suppying retail shops and American Airbases.{Silkback {Ltd }- finishing clothing from abroad. {T.A.B.}- general engineering, set up by ex-chief engineer at{Courtaulds. {S.R.Motors}- auto repairs, mostly of heavy vehicles. Despite recent publicity about government aid for small businesses, these have had none. A total of 64 people are employed in these firms.
